description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Tanzania vs Kenya in the Friendlies
title: Tanzania vs Kenya: Friendlies stats & head-to-head
title_page: Tanzania vs Kenya: Friendlies stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Goal!
Goal! Tanzania 0, Kenya 2. Ryan Ogam (Kenya) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal.
Goal!
Goal! Tanzania 0, Kenya 1. Boniface Muchiri (Kenya) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal.
